m_szDocTitle: Vehicles Fuel Economy Continues to Rise | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Vehicles Fuel Economy Continues to Rise December 7th, 2011 by Joshua S Hill     Sometimes there can be good news, as in this case, thanks to researchers at the University of Michigan Transportation Research Institute who have released figures stating that average fuel economy of all new vehicles sold in the US is up for the second straight month. According to the figures, the average fuel economy of all cars, light trucks, minivans, and SUVs purchased in the month of November was 22.6 miles per gallon, up from 22.6 miles per gallon in October and up from 22.1 miles per gallon in both August an
